Game.Name: Team USA Basketball (USA, Europe)
Game.plot: Released in 1992, this addition to the Electronic Arts' basketball series centers on that year's Olympics in Barcelona and features the United States "Dream Team" with players such as Michael Jordan, Magic Johnson, Larry Bird, Charles Barkley and Karl Malone.Along with the US team, there are 13 other national teams with real team rosters. Additionally, there is an "All-World" team with the best of the non-USA players.Gameplay: mechanics and graphics are identical to contemporary games in the NBA Playoffs series. New signature moves are included, and the gameplay follows international FIBA rules.Critical ReceptionWhen released Electronic Gaming Monthly issued the following scores, 5,8,8,7 adding, "...there really is nothing different from Bulls vs. Lakers, this cart will definitely be a collector's item. There are a few new features like Official Olympic teams and players in each country's national anthem".
Game.Notes: The game could be played in various ways: players could play against each other, or against the computer. Games against the computer were divided into two levels, "exhibition" or "tournament". Players could pick from one of the countries around the world to represent in the Olympics: USA, Yugoslavia, Angola, Australia, Canada, China, the CIS, Croatia, France, Italy, Lithuania, Slovenia, Netherlands, Spain.
